channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- ASP.NET
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- ASP.NET

item.title: CVE-2018-8171|2024-08-05T06:46:13.464Z -- microsoft -- asp.net
item.description: A Security Feature Bypass vulnerability exists in ASP.NET when the number of incorrect login attempts is not validated, aka "ASP.NET Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability." This affects ASP.NET, ASP.NET Core 1.1, ASP.NET Core 1.0, ASP.NET Core 2.0, ASP.NET MVC 5.2.
